description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Salmon Tortillas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Salmon Tortillas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine avocado, onion, capers, lime rind and 1 tbs of juice in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Spread cheese onto tortillas. Top with salmon, avocado mixture and parsley. Transfer to a serving platter. Serve.
